p: In addition, PQR contains nucleoside compounds: deoxyuridine, deoxythymidine, deoxyadenosine and adenine. Lignan compounds such as pinoresinol and 4,4′, 8′ - trihydroxy-3,3′- dimethoxy-9′ – lignanolide. And Panaxynol compounds include panaxynol, panaxytriol, panaxynol A and panaxynol D. PQR also contains polyphenols compounds such as vanillic acid, p-coumaric acid, cinnamic acid ( Jing et al., 2011), caffeic acid and chlorogenic acid ( Wang et al., 2007).
